headline: Devon Energy Corp (NYSE:DVN) Edges Past Q4 2025 Estimates, Stock Dips in After-Hours Trading
summary: Devon Energy (DVN) narrowly beat Q4 2025 revenue estimates with in-line EPS. The stock dipped slightly as the results and 2026 outlook failed to exceed high market expectations.

raw.headline: Devon Energy Corp (NYSE:DVN) Edges Past Q4 2025 Estimates, Stock Dips in After-Hours Trading

headline: Devon Energy Profit, Revenue Slip Ahead of Coterra Merger
summary: The oil and natural gas company reported net income of $562 million, or 90 cents a share, compared with $639 million, or 98 cents a share, a year earlier.

raw.headline: Devon Energy Profit, Revenue Slip Ahead of Coterra Merger

headline: Devon Energy (DVN) Tops Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Devon Energy (DVN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +0.82% and +2.51%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Devon Energy (DVN) Tops Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: Devon Energy: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Oklahoma City-based company said it had profit of 90 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to 82 cents per share. The results exceeded Wall Street expectations.

headline: Devon Energy Reports Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2025 Results and Declares Quarterly Fixed Dividend
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, Okla., Feb. 17, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Devon Energy Corp. (NYSE: DVN) today reported financial and operational results for the fourth-quarter and full-year 2025. The company also declared its quarterly dividend and provided a 2026 outlook. Devon’s earnings release, supplemental financial tables, guidance and related earnings presentation can be accessed via the Investor Relations section of Devon’s website, www.devonenergy.com.
